title: Immunization. - 2nd ed.

description: The external symptoms of disease, and how disease affects the blood-stream, are shown; immunity may be obtained from a disease either by contracting it and surviving, thus gaining (usually) active immunization; or by vaccination, which provides passive immunity, is just as effective, and does not endanger life. Second edition version.
